title: Wolf's Man
description:
Orphaned. Abandoned. Raised by unsuspecting humans. Detective Nate Rollins knows he's different. With better hearing, better eyesight, and an uncanny intuition, he excels in his job. And struggles to appear normal.Then a woman climbs into his SUV and begs for help. As a cop, he's duty-bound to protect her from the men chasing her.But she's not quite human.Â 

And she insists he isn't human, either.
author: Lynn Nodima
